name: DOP Love Story - Games DOP
description:
Your finger is eraser - delete to finding the solution!
Try to delete properly it to find out the truth!

Here comes a Love Story! A Love Story that YOU are the one who will decide it. Like a detective’s magnifying glass, your eraser is the key to unraveling the hidden mysteries of the couple in this thinking game - Games DOP Love Story.

It's not easy to beat all levels in Delete One Part - Game Brain Teaser, all that you need to do is using an eraser, sounds simple but it's not. The mechanics may be easy, but the puzzles will keep your brain guessing!

Why should you choose EOP Puzzle?
- Just touch and drag finger to erase and see what lies behind it.
- There’s no penalty for failure in games DOP.
- Unexpected humorous pictures will make your day!
- 200+ brain teasers to testing your drawing skill.
- Unique gameplay brings a clever combination of logic puzzles and drawings.
- Levels are regularly updated weekly.

Challenge your attention and develop your drawing skills now!
Download and play Games DOP Love Story - EOP & Brain Teaser!
